statements: SELECT * FROM customer_kyc;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_kyc;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_kyc WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_kyc WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, identification_number FROM customer_kyc ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_kyc;
SELECT * FROM customer_kyc WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_kyc WHERE identification_number LIKE 'AB%';
SELECT * FROM customer_kyc WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customer_kyc ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM kyc_customers;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM kyc_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, address, id_proof_type FROM kyc_customers WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_type, document_path, uploaded_at FROM kyc_documents WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM kyc_customers ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM kyc_customers;
SELECT full_name, address, date_of_birth FROM kyc_customers ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, id_proof_type FROM kyc_customers WHERE id_proof_type = 'Passport';
SELECT * FROM kyc_customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth;
SELECT c.full_name, d.document_type FROM kyc_customers c JOIN kyc_documents d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.document_type = 'Passport';
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_email, customer_phone_number FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM kyc_documents WHERE document_type = 'passport' AND expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM kyc_documents WHERE document_type = 'Passport' AND expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM kyc_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_personal_information;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_personal_information;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM customer_personal_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_identification ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, document_type FROM customer_identification WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_personal_information;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM customer_personal_information WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT cpi.full_name, ci.document_type, ci.issue_date FROM customer_personal_information cpi JOIN customer_identification ci ON cpi.customer_id = ci.customer_id ORDER BY ci.issue_date DESC;

SELECT cpi.full_name, cv.verification_status, cv.verification_date FROM customer_personal_information cpi JOIN customer_verification cv ON cpi.customer_id = cv.customer_id WHERE cv.verification_status = TRUE;

SELECT cpi.full_name, cal.activity_description, cal.activity_date FROM customer_personal_information cpi JOIN customer_activity_log cal ON cpi.customer_id = cal.customer_id WHERE cal.activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM contact_details WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT document_type, document_name FROM legal_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT employer_name AS company, job_title AS position FROM employment WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01'
SELECT * FROM identification WHERE issue_date >= '2020-01-01' AND expiry_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM contact_details WHERE address LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT employer_name, job_title FROM employment ORDER BY employer_name DESC
SELECT document_type, document_name, upload_date FROM legal_documents WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
